entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for May 17, 2024

summary.caption: “Remember, Calloway, this is their biggest and best warrior—so stay alert! When you knock him down, he’s gonna come right back at ya!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for May 17, 2024

summary.caption: The townsfolk all stopped and stared; they didn’t know the tall stranger who rode calmly through their midst, but they did know the reign of terror had ended.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for May 17, 2024
The Far Side comic 4 for May 17, 2024

summary.caption: “Wow. … That’s ironic. I think something bit me.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for May 17, 2024

summary.caption: “Whoa! Smells like a French primate house in here.”
